roleset.name: move aimlessly

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Bond prices rambled yesterday as investors kept close watch on the stock market and worried about a wave of new supply .

propbank.arg: as investors kept close watch on the stock market and worried about a wave of new supply

example.name: ARG0
example.text: Bond prices rambled yesterday as investors kept close watch on the stock market and worried about a wave of new supply .

propbank.arg: as investors kept close watch on the stock market and worried about a wave of new supply

example.name: both args
example.text: they are relegated to the bottom tier of the exhibit , or else the landscape would be dramatically altered by their rambling across the terrain .

roleset.note: RAMBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ramble' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2. (from ramble.01-v predicate notes)
RAMBLING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on ramble-v.01. (from rambling.01-n)

roleset.name: talk aimlessly

example.name: ARG0
example.text: I apologize for continuing my ramble but ... ,

example.name: argMs
example.text: It is just the same politically illiterate ramblings you hear from any Tory hating band wagoners , this should be left for the columns of Heat magazine rather than a debate forum .

propbank.arg: you hear from any Tory hating band wagoners

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: His rambling of such things was normal behavior now .

example.name: arg 1 for ramble about as well
example.text: And it was n't so much her rambling about these organisms , but her pantomime - passion about said subject .

example.name: use GOL for listener
example.text: When McCoy starts his rambling to Spock about removing Kirk with a powerful ' Are you out of your Vulcan mind ? '

roleset.note: RAMBLE-V NOTES: Also a phrasal variant 'ramble on' which takes the same PAS in both rolesets. (from ramble.02-v)
RAMBLING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, ramble-v.02. (from rambling.02-n)
RAMBLE-N NOTES: Based on verb entry ramble.02, differs in addition of arg2 listener. No relevant VN entry. (from ramble.01-n)
Arg1 in the verb frame contained both the utterance and the subject matter, which have been split up here. (from rambling.02-n)
